onboarding_intro.title: Orchestrate isn't ChatGPT
onboarding_intro.description: You’re running your own system. It reads files, executes tools, and saves real memory.

task_vs_note.title: Tasks vs Notes
task_vs_note.description: Tasks go in `tasks.json` and have a title, status, and optional description. Notes are looser — any insight, quote, or idea can live here.

memory_design.title: How memory works
memory_design.description: Your memory files are just structured JSON. You can update them live — no save button needed.

dropzone_power.title: Use the Drop Zone
dropzone_power.description: Any file dropped there becomes readable. You can log notes from it, pull tasks, or store key learnings.

tool_calls.title: Every tool is callable
tool_calls.description: Each Orchestrate tool is just a script. You can run any one with a sentence — it’s real execution, not simulation.
